name: nakayoshi
description: これまでに夫婦で行った都道府県

scripts.css:build: node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path source/stylesheets/ source/stylesheets/source.scss --source-map source/stylesheets/all.css.map source/stylesheets/all.css
scripts.css:watch: node-sass -w --output-style compressed --include-path source/stylesheets/ source/stylesheets/source.scss --source-map source/stylesheets/all.css.map source/stylesheets/all.css
scripts.js:build: npm run js:lint && npm run js:browserify && npm run js:uglify
scripts.build: npm run js:build && npm run css:build

author: kyokutyo
